Plot: Two childhood friends are recruited for a suicide bombing in Tel Aviv.
Title: Paradise Now
Writer: Hany Abu-Assad, Bero Beyer, Pierre Hodgson
Actors: Lubna Azabal, Hamza Abu-Aiaash, Kais Nashif, Lutuf Nouasser
tomatoConsensus: This film delves deeply into the minds of suicide bombers, and the result is unsettling.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 13 wins & 15 nominations.
